definition: The act, condition, quality, or fact of converging.
Any of various structures, such as the external ear, that resemble a shell in shape.
A place in which instruction is given to students.
To cause (oneself) to reflect on or consider.
to become free from constraint, stiffness, or severity; relax and be less formal, more natural, etc.
To place or arrange according to class, kind, or size; classify:
having qualities associated with home; comfortable, familiar, cozy, etc.
the nasal passages; esp., the nostrils
One of a number of successive payments in settlement of a debt.
The isotope of uranium with mass number 235, fissionable with slow neutrons.
To form a crack or cleft or cause a crack or cleft in.
